getRasters

private java.awt.image.Raster[] getRasters(RectifiedGridCoverage grid)
creates an original and a surrogate Raster of the given RectifiedGridCoverage. The surrogate Raster corresponds to the definied rangesetData classification and colorMapping.

Parameters:
grid -
Returns:
two Rasters (0: original, 1: surrogate)
